name: Crow Story (Jafar Dakhan)
description:
A tiny platformer adventure game about a crow. made in 3 days for the Zanga Game jam 11.

____________________________________________________________________

Controls:

- move : arrow keys

- jump : space

- flap : z

- throw : x

Credits:

- Art, programming, sounds : me جعفر

- Scribble by Juju Adams for text rendering

- Engine: GameMaker Studio 2

- Record player song: Clair de lune, slowed

Notes: 

- A Web version is coming soon.

- The game is a little slow, an optimized version will be uploaded when the jam ends.
